fields.review: The place has got a real rare cuisine which is bit hard to find in Kolkata. Tastes from across states like Nagaland, Manipur, Mizoram are real delicacies. Try out the traditional dishes but make sure you don't have reservations for different and local food from the birthplace of the dishes. Worth checking out!Tuhina Dutta

I had the Malaysian rice and Shanghai squid at this place. The food was good. They offer a lot of varieties on sea food which are not there at other places. Decor and service were up to mark. Next time would try their specialities in the tribal food section.

Absolutely in love with this place. First coming to the decor of the food joint- enetring the resturant you will find two departments; one side is decorated as per the under the sea scenario and the other is one tribal and food is also served accordingly. I tried out there tribal food. Baansh-pora Mutton with Saru Chakli just blew away our minds..it was simply awesome. Then Jhupu pisi'r mutton and res rice was infused with great tribal flavours. In desert we tried out tiramisu which was great as...

Seafood? Yes this is the right place man. Tribal food? Don't just look anywhere else.. Just drop in here. Konkan sea salad had squids prawn chicken in mayonese and red n yellow bell peppers etc. Baansh pora chicken was yum. Though the wild red rice was spicy,it was tasting amazing. I would love visiting it again.

The interior is a bit too loud. Understood its themed on underwater environment, but seemed a bit too colourful and cheap. Should be more subtle. That's the only negative i could find. The food is very good and different. They offer food that are specialities in different parts of the country. The minced mutton smoked in bamboo was awesome and you cpuld feel the smoke. The sea food noodles and squid were really good too. Nice to see a place offering something different and good.

Flurys is located near to Park Street metro station. This legendary restaurant was established in 1927 and is also known for their breakfast,bakery items.So we ordered their english breakfast with coffee which was really amazing.Ambience was so legendary that you can feel it but I must say their service was poor.

Tried the rum ball (yummy), the coffee eclair (different. Tasty), the cherry chocolate pastry (good) and the chocolate truffle (good). Also picked up a plum cake to take home The place is crowded - impossible to get a table at peak hours, and you've to work to catch the attention of the staff. Overall - ok for the experience - but won't blow your mind

Maybe this place was great in 1927 as a teahouse but it's really pathetic now. Great decor, but really it is a wasted effort. Fresh Pineapple Cream was okay. Apple pie was good. Almond cake disappointed. What was most irritating is that there is an army of waiters roaming around but none can serve water despite requesting multiple times. I don't generally review, but I am forced to put a review sitting at Flurys due to very callous attitude of staff. Over rated. Over priced. Very few items good.

One of the most popular place in Kolkata. Located in park street.. !! As one enters this place , it gives an exotic kind of feeling. The chairs and the chandelier gives that amazing touch to the beautiful ambiance. Especially That pink touch in evrything is such a treat to eye. As it was sunday afternoon so the crowd was obvious.But the service was somewhere not up to the mark. Coming to the food. We ordered penne pasta in tomato basil sauce and chicken cheese croissant. The croissant was really...

Whatta disappointment early in the morning! The Kolkattans used to fancy this place since its' inception. But now many of us don't recommend this to anyone. Exorbitant prices,pathetic service and unprofessional behavior of the staff- define Flurys in a nutshell. The club sandwich has lost its' charm. The mutton puff was tasty. The scrambled eggs was good too. The waiters are absolutely a shame! They are not attentive at all. Even on repetitive requests the food served is delayed. We were absolut...

The view of St. Paul’s Cathedral, Victoria Memorial is breathe taking. The panoramic view of its neighbours just adds to the delight of sight. But you can rarely find this part of the restaurant empty. We took the space with a couch and a few seats (more of a friends couch kinda setup). In those cozy chairs the delicacies and the drinks made our experience all the more happening. We ordered Butterfly wings (my friends ordered it twice though I didn’t fancy it much- moreover you get only thre...

The food: Unique and superb! Must try: Tiger Beef. (They don't have French fries, that's just too bad!) The ambience: Probably one of the best in Kolkata. You have a clear view of Victoria, the 42 and some more breath-takers with a beer in your hand. Aha!  The music: Cool. The house DJ is a Poets of the fall fan- just to give an idea what kinda music you should expect. Parking: Paid and safe.

Housed on 9th floor, this restaurant gives you a panoramic view of Victoria memorial, St. Paul's Cathedral and surrounding. I visited this gastro-pub in a weekend evening ... place was almost buzzing with young vibrant crowd! They have got an open-air seating arrangement as well. The interior decor is quite cool and cozy! Dimly lit ambience is perfect for a dinner date with your special one.  Talking food... they have come up with their unique choice of dishes, most of which are fusion items. It...

Great place, awesome view, perfect ambience, good crowd, nice cocktails, expensive overall, food is also pretty good but portions could be better. It's definitely one of the coolest hangout places in Kolkata right now. I would go there again.

Perfect place to booze n dine. Interiors were fantabulous. Food ordered were upto the mark. Moburger was enjoyable. Let down was the Thai curry. Server could have suggested for something else when asked!! Taxed too much.. Bill of 3195. ended up paying tax of about 600.
Nothing different from rahmania, arsalan and places of the same type. Okay place if you wish to go light on your pocket and enjoy the local version of mughlai food.
One of my favourite restaurants especially for biryani..Chicken/Mutton biryanis are simply delicious.I really prefer chicken kasha as side dish..A perfect place for all Biryani lovers..
One of the Best and Heaven for Biryani lovers. I absolutely love their Mutton biryani and Mutton Rezalla. The food is very fitting and worthy. Service is good and Pocket pinch is fine.

This was my first visit and it was fruitful. We ordered chicken reshmi kebab and mutton biryani. The chicken pieces were soft and succulent. They were super tasty. The biryani was too good and the quantity was more than sufficient. Must visit for biryani lovers. Would visit again. 😃

Went to Shiraz for a weekend lunch. We ordered masala kulcha, tangri kabab, biryani, chicken chap, and chicken/mutton rezala for take away. Needless to say everything was extremely delicious. The experience was really great.

One of the best family restaurants with delicious food, nice ambience and quick service. It is my favourite and I happen to go there two or three times each year. Golden fried babycorn, chilly pork are its speciality. A must go for every foodie.
Budget restaurant with nice ambience and good tasty food.Service is quite prompt. One must try Fish Irani kebab, it just melts in mouth....Luv'd it.

The place is situated near rangoli showroom at triangular park.the place is big and decoration is just awesome.v day special decoration is jst mindblowing.we ordered chicken sweet and corn soup,chicken prawn fried rice,thai chicken with cashewnut and colddrinks.all of them are too good.staffs are very friendly.price is reasonable.very good place for go out with family and dear ones.

One of the best legendary family restaurant for years. Hatari has always been the favorite. Located near Traingular park, its a two minute walk.  Visited the place more than the many times. From North indian to chinese they are masters in everything.  My favorite from the place is the dry chilli pork. To all the pork lovers do give a visit. Absolutely amazing.  Other good remark is the quantity, they serve amazing quantity along with great quality.  Service is always friendly as by year long sta...

First time visited... But waiting for another visit... Bcoz love this place...awsm food... Very much satisfied... Service was good... Taste was xclnt... Price all over ok side... Aaro ache baki ...asbe porer review te . :-p

Couldn't give it any less... Awesome.. Awesome.. Awesome and a 100 times awesome is the only thing I can tell about the place.. Commenting on anything will be an offense.. Though there's always some room for improvement, but as of now it's one of the best..

The ambience of the place was LIT! The DJ was great and got us all grooving. Since I don't drink, I won't be able to tell you anything in that department. I ordered the Green Apple Mocktail with tacos on the side. However, the Dark and White Chocolate Mousse Torte was out of the world. Must have! Overall the place had an amazing vibe, innovative presentation and great staff!

Had visited this place alot of times. Let's come to the point one by one. 1. Ambience is  superb , with music playing all along with my favourite track list, almost set up the mood instantly with few drinks in your belly. The best part is the quotes written in there wall,you can go on reading and reading again. 2. There menu has varieties , especially there cocktails section , you will get to see some unique combos of drinks presented in innovative style, that will make you say amazing . 3. Food...

Food: 4/5 Ambience: 5/5 Service: 5/5 Location: 5/5  Definitely one of the most happening pubs in Kolkata, the Irish House is a perfect place to have fun while laughing and drinking and munching. The moment we entered the place, the music seemed TOO loud. I couldn't hear my sister say anything. The alcohol seemed to make our ears stronger to the music.  The headless chicken platter had a lot of stuff but overpriced. We had a nice time. The food didn't matter too much. The service was good: the wa...

Slainte!!!  That's the only thought you would have throughout your time at Irish house. The ambience is bang on target, the staff is courteous, and lovely music. One should go there with fun on their mind, so the higher-than-usual-volume of music, unlike few, did not bother me. We ordered Corn and jalapeño cheese fritters, Chicken popcorn, Three lions steak and chips, Mac n cheese, and chocolate brownies. The steak was perfect.  As for drinks, we ordered LIITs and draught beer. Good food and ri...

I made many plans to go there.Ultimately it comes at a time when it takes all my excitements away.We went there at evening time. No one was there.Ordered their popular bread Julu pitha and Ngatok.Stuffed bread Julu was totally a mess.Ngatok,kind a vapa fish was good.Staffs,decorations are all ok.

The sea food was too good..all the sea food are available out here but one thing i did not like about is the food was not kind off spicy..i know its sea food but still spicy i prefer..i had the bejing and the Malaysian rice with prawn..i liked the small version of octopus 😘  The place was really nice..full on tribal feeling.. Hut kind of restaurant..even too the glasses were like that ... the service was good enough..not bad.. They even served us though..if anyone is a lover of sea food they ...

A wide variety of seafood and tribal food is available for choice. A very well diversified mini is always a plus point. Food quality is even appreciated.  I ordered for Smoked Octopus, Burnt Chilly Prawn, Seafood Beijing Rice and Onion Kheer. All the preparations were great but I felt the oil used could be a little bit less. Otherwise the taste seemed quite satisfactory. Coming to the service part.... I entered the restaurant as soon as it opened at 6 pm. There was only one server I could see an...

Now this place finally got ticked off from my wish list, after so many attempts of trying to visit them. Yes these attempts were worth it.  They remain closed for couple of hours after lunch time, hence we went in an empty restaurant at 6pm today. This was a bit difficult to locate but we managed to find it, which was right beside the lane of Anjali jewellers in golpark. Coming to the decor and theme, it was really appealing with all those sea creatures and tribal style seats, tables. They have ...

Worst food I've ever had since 2017.. Not worth of spending 2000 for lunch.. Staffs behavior is worse than food. Momos we order were served cold and completely hard. Octopus was not upto mark. When i told the waiter to change the momo he just denied to do so..!!!! Even they don't have little courtesy to  apology for the bad food and service. Definitely one of those place which is not recommend for others unless enemies...!!

Had there been a rating of 10/5 here, this place deserved it.. The moment u enter u are taken to a different world altogether.. Wow what interiors and supplementing that is the ghazals which take u straight back to the mughal era... What a place man.. What creativity.. Hats off..

Home delivery from this place absolutely unrecommendable   The kababs ordered were hard  The mutton  biryani ordered was very tasteless , the mutton wasnt cooked properly the rice was not upto the mark as well   Deeply disappointed   Will never order from here again

Firstly,I love this place for their awesome royal decor and ambience . To my notice the Salt Lake outlet was comparatively bit smaller, had to wait . But the dishes always bring a smile on my face.. Be it the Qalmi kebab, Raan biriyani or Awadhi Handi biriyani..  The mutton pieces just melts being so soft. For the dessert I always stick to their firni! 😍

This place left me speechless..  The best mutton biriyani I have ever had..  The mutton tasted soo good.. Yum yum..  We had ordered Galawti kebab and rann biriyani..  Galawti kebab just melted in my mouth..  A gulp of sheer awesomeness..  One pot of biriyani is enough for two people..

Nom nom, yummy, delicious, top notch,etc- all these adjectives aren't enough to describe the food this place serves. Beautiful royal decor coupled with fast service and amazing North Indian dishes. Don't forget to note the color of the AC :P Their Mutton Raan Biryani is just top notch. Succulent tender mutton pieces and the flavor of the rice would drive you crazy. The Galawati Kabab is a must try. The spicy perfectly marinated mutton just melts in the mouth and you keep on yearning for more.The...

Aminia is located near to Kolkata municipal corporation building,New Market Area.We ordered chicken biryani and firni.Biryani was like pulao not at all spicy but taste was good.Firni was amazing like the one I tasted in hyderabad.Ambience was cool but service was okayish.
Good old place with a makeover, fantastic flavours of food, Aminia Special, Awahndi Biryani was awesome. Special mention the Pudding in the dessert. I haven't had such a delicious pudding for long.

December fever, wedding season, and we were busy as usual in and around new market. Stomach bell pulled us automatically to Aminia and had mutton biriyani and chicken chap to get energized on. They are the flag bearer of Kolkata biriyani.

Should I comment on their taste of biriyani? No..I don't have that audacity. According to me it's just second best in Kolkata. (First one is India restaurant in khidirpore.) Just have it whenever you feel the urge to have a perfect light biriyani. You may have the biriyani with chicken chap but this biriyani doesn't need any side dish. Finish your feast with a pudding or firni and don't forget to Have the pan from the next pan shop. Overall this age old restaurant has maintained it's legacy thro...

Visited few days back. Hard so much about it. I liked the service. We were sitting in the non AC section which gave us that old school feeling. They have almost similar menu items as any other restaurant of this category. Where they stand out is the legacy. They are one of the oldest and one of its own kind. Do they stand apart. We ordered mutton biriyani and chicken chap. I must say the biriyani was too dry and quantity was not enough for one person. But the chap was mouth watering and I must s...

Am a frequent visitor to this place. Almost everything they serve tastes the same as the likes of other arsalan outlets (obviously), rahmania, aminia, shiraj. It's as if the same chefs cook in all of these places. Its a ok sort of place if you wish to go light on your pocket and have the taste of biriyani with local flavour.

Worst food i had ordered yet in Kolkata. The way they pack the food is pathetic. Also i received my order in 1.5 hrs. Food was also not good and it was not in a position to eat. I will never recommend anyone to order anything from this place. One suggestion: Atleast train your chef or packing boy to cut Naan in peices before packing and Naan is always packed in silver foil not in a paper enevelope.

visited this place on 14th feb.Tried their chicken arsalan kabab for the first time and the dish was awesome but that cheese on chicken must be liquid,otherwise taste is not good enough..Chicken tikka butter masala was good..cheese nan and kima nan,both was ok types..not very good.fresh lime soda required more soda and less water,but their firni was refreshing..service was good but atmosphere was really very bad,crowdy,congested..clumsy sitting arrangement..

If you cannot deliver you should not accept the order in the first place. And even if you have made the mistake of acceptinf the order it is unacceptable to cancel it after 20 minutes when the delivery time is 35 minutes

Arsalan is located near Park Circus Area.I heard a lot about their biryanis and other dishes.So finally paid a visit yesterday and ordered Mutton chop,Mutton lucknowi biryani.Mutton lucknowi biryani was great with succulent Mutton pieces and biryani was spicy as I expected.But not as much spicy as hyderabadi dum biryani which is my all time favourite.Ambience of this legendary place was great and service was also great.

We dropped in here on Valentine's Day for a quick small lunch. The interior is well decorated and the staffs are courteous. We ordered for a fish steak,Chicken Espeteda and soft drinks. The fish pieces were succulent and came with spicy rice and veggies. The hanging dish chicken cheese espetda comes with two sides.We took spicy rice and mashed potato. Well,the rice and potato did not taste nice. The chicken pieces were soft and tasted nice. Service is prompt.Food presentation is neat.

I finally went to Barcelos after craving their delicious colorful burgers for a very long time! And sadly I was disappointed.  We ordered Peri Peri Black Magic(Black bun burger with roasted chicken) and Peri Peri Red Hottie(Pink bun burger with veg patty) along with Oreo and KitKat shakes. On the side of the burger we had ordered a portion of potato wedges with dip. The shakes were quite good, rich and thick! They were served in nice little jars. I've had better versions of both, but there were ...

It was kind off a cousin reunion after a long time and what good way to celebrate than to eat out. Barcelos was a week or so old and was 'hot cake' in this part of the city. So without second thoughts we decided to give it a try. First things first, the place is particularly decorated and gives u that feel of a burger joint. Courteous staff and a good ambience set us up sufficiently. We tried a sizzler and a lamb burger on recommendation from the guy attending us. Honestly it was in that 'thin r...

Another screwed up resturant the most blunt and tasteless chicken peri peri chicken...feels like worst chicken I ever had...if you are up in Kolkata you need to be taste creative...you cant run with such blunt tasting food...

Try this place out to taste the flavours of Portuguese food. The drinks especially are a treat for your taste buds. A special mention for the Sangria. For appetizers we tried the chicken thighs and mutton kebabs. Both the dishes were exceptionally tasty. There are 4 different sauces they offer your food to be cooked in, 4 sauces have different levels of spice in it. However when it came to the main course, it was bit of a let down. We ordered the 1/4 chicken and the chicken was a little dry. Als...

Went to grid on 14th Feb. Well ambiance and food was up to the mark. We ordered Bombay chicken wings with blue cheese,mithibai college sandwich , van wale chowmin. In drinks we ordered sangria and club poison. Both drinks and food was good . Quantity of food is also standard. They take cover charges of 1000 rupees per head. You have to redeem this amount same day. As it was valentines day, they said it was full booked.However they managed to get us two seats. In case of seating arrangement ,they...

Was at grid last nite and was pleasantly surprised , delicious fiod , well laid out bar and brewery, party zone and smokin area and above all great music . The atmosphere was infectious, will b back soon 👍

Great place to hang out with friends or go for a drink or two. The decor is like sections in form of square grids and all the seating different .  The music on saturday is great .  The food is good and the place does not take reservation so be there a little early ,  if you want a table or wait at the bar.  We ordered the veg grid box which was good for munchies to go with the drinks, try the chicken chilly was good and the pizza are also good.  Go for the cocktails , friends tried the whisky so...
Visited the place yday with friends. Overall experience was very good. Food was awsome..But just that some of the serving staff seemed inexperienced..
Finally visited this place.. Hrd it's menu ia set up by one of the master chef..  Awesome ambience.. Awesome service.. Awesome food..  Lovely music.. Will try out once again

Whenever I drop in my flag stays up till I am satisfied with the plethora of kababs; be it chicken, mutton or even the occasional prawn. Ultimately I have to cut down on the main course as I am almost full by the time I finish with the barbecues. If you love barbecues it's the place to be! Tuhina Dutta

The best buffet place in Kolkata. Good ambience with excellent service and food. If you are non vegetarian and love to eat chicken mutton prawn , a must go place in the city. Their service is outstanding as well. Once we didn't like one of the mutton  starter and after saying this to one of the stuffs, the chef personally came to us and after knowing our likes and dislikes, he prepared a dish exclusively for us - such a sweet gesture to make your customers happy! And I personally love their dess...

This place is a wonder. Huge buffet spread! Humble staff. The buffet starts with number if kebabs, tikka, roast which are served on tandoor on table. A complimentary drink is also given with options of fresh lime soda, coke, beer. In main course you have everythin ranging from biryani, paneer, aloo, mutton, egg, fish, vegetables, number of salads and many more. Breads which you ask for will be served on table. In desert section you are spoilt for choices. Cakes, pudding, sewai, gulabjamun, fresh...

One of the best places for buffets in Kolkata. Actually,  the best in Kolkata. They have an amazing range available for both Vegetarians and Non Vegetarians. Some really good starters are served. Deserts are good too. All should visit at least once.
Awesome good quality..  and the best starters and best desserts... really best buffers in town.. serving quality too good.. place is really nice..

Salt lake sector V is the IT hub of Kolkata with swanky workplaces and offices everywhere. Jaisalmer, with its majestic outlook and grandeur serves as the largest oasis in this desert land of offices and work culture. It's true that Sector V, in the last few years has seen a number of restaurants cropping up, but Jaisalmer by far stands the tallest among them.  Located at Globsyn Crystals, Jaisalmer brings the royalty and grandeur of Rajasthan to Kolkata with its picturesque interiors and magnif...

Been here quite a lot of time. A very popular restaurant in Sector V with a great taste of Indian food.The ambiance is good with a two tier seating arrangement and the design of the chairs giving a look of royal dinner.Clearly a great place to go with group of people.

A very popular restaurant in Sector V. I dined here with my team on Valentine's Day,2017.   The things I liked: 1. We were given a very pretty round table with the Valentine's Day decorations 2. Mutton Rara Punjabi, and Jhaal farezi out of the dishes we had  Things I didn't like: 1. The service was pretty slow. (Assuming that this was because of the Valentine's Day rush) 2. The Tangdi kebabs had a slight odour of kerosine 3. The Reshmi chicken was a little bland   The overall decor and location ...

Valentine's day and a buffet on the plate ... so far so good .. but then nothing special ..ambience okay ..food..well biriyani and mutton were good .. starters which were served on the table were not up to the mark ...staff well behaved ... I felt they lacked planning ..as waiters had to wait on cooks to serve the starters ... shouldn't be that way per me ... but will like to come again on a non-special day ... btw deserts seems to be yum .. but am yet to try them

Booked through Zomato for our office party, Booking facility is awesome. Decent Place with good food. Lamb Preparations were excellent. Pan Fried Fish was a disaster. overall its a good place to dine at.
Its like a terrace cafe, attmosphere is clam n soothing, open kitchen so that u can have a view, not crowded as most of the cafes are. Will visit again.

When you love to go to a good restaurant for a breakfast, @Cafe Swiss, swissotel should be one of your choices. (Only mentioning it for the people in Kolkata)  Food: Coming to the food section, it had a section of continental and Indian cuisines. They had a buffet too with all the corporates and residents of the hotels approaching the same.   For the food we had ordered, one Gobi paratha and one club kachori, with one simple cold coffee. Gobi paratha was terrific, with the cauliflower properly m...

I'm getting more and more confused with Zomato rating system, last week one of my reviews was deleted even the rating was retained. Today in the past 2 hours the rating of this restaurant moved from 3.7 to 3.9 with 238 ratings it's a significant jump given that only 5 others were present at the restaurant during this time. I'll share this on FB to keep a track of stuff. As far as the restaurant experience goes, we tried as varied dishes as Mezze platter, fish curry with rice, better fried seafoo...

Peruvian cuisine is a strange confluence of inca food mixed with numerous varieties of immigrants (spanish, italian, german and west african)- hence given its seperate identity in world cuisine. Corn and potato is the staple diet there with numerous varieties of chilly …. Also, meat is used abundantly – so we didn’t have any problem.  The peruvian spread was for one day only in the Cafe Swiss, but we were assured that some of the items will be kept in the regular menu.  Now, swissotel is s...

Went there as a group of pork lovers and the pork fest was awesome. It was a lunch to remember with potato n quail egg salad & sausage with Swiss cheese the yummy beginning followed by crispy bacons and sausages with bbq sauce.Then came the pork salad and pulled pork(only wished it was smoked) were juicy, divinely seasoned and spiced. The pork belly and loin in the main course was absolutely brilliant and that made my day.The dessert was a befitting finale to the feast. The maple, bacon ice ...

This was my third or fourth visit to Bohemian, but the last time was quite a long while ago. They now have a floor upstairs. A complaint I have with most restaurants is the way the seats are crammed which leaves little space between tables. It is understandably a luxury for restaurants operating out of small spaces but it would be nice to give a thought on how not to squeeze tables for 2 people between bigger groups. Two people on a Sunday lunch at an expensive restaurant are most likely looking...

Tried their food and hard drinks ,overall a nice place to visit with family and friends.  Ambience- average Food - Delicious Service - Staff were polite enough. Prices - It is expensive  .I wanted to try a lot of things but the bill was already high.  You may try it once. I will try it again for sure and review it .

This restaurant defines passion !!! The ambience,the food, everything here is created out of passion! The USP of this restaurant is that you can order anything and you will be surprised in a good way ! We went there on a winter afternoon for lunch and was served chef's special amouse-bouche , watermelon topped with some white and green dip which was very refreshing and a palate cleanser itself, then we ordered Stir fried mutton with mustard and coriander - chef's style followed by Murshidabadi B...

Its a very classy place. Price is little bit higher but uniqueness of the Food justified it.  Awesome food , unique presentation. Staffs are very friendly. Every one should visit this place & give your tastebuds a real change.

Heard about this restaurant from a friend so went there to try their bengali fusion food..  Was excited to try out this version. First we started with the appetizer ordered smoked bhetki as per the recommendation from the service guy but felt nothing special.. Then again as per his recommendation tried Prawn stewed with paanchforon, peanut and tamarind and it was so disgusting.. Then was so angry that we decided not to ask him anymore and ordered Chicken breast stuffed with kolmi green, shimmer...

We took a home delivery and I will say the pizzas are quite good....But the lasange was quite nice too....also the price is quite lower than reputed pizza joints! The size is ok but all over a nice experience. Definitely will eat from here again

I've ordered a lot of pizzas from this place, they are really good, each with distinct tastes and I love them all. Today I ordered a Double Chk Lasagna and a Shawarma roll. Utterly disappointed with the Shawarma! Pita bread was rock hard, filling is less and not good at all. The Lasagne was good, pretty generous amount! The main disadvantage of this place, after placing so many orders is their delivery time! They are always late, even sometimes, an hour!!
Just had veg pizza it was really nice and within my budget.  I would love to order more from the outlet and would advise others to order from there too..

I found this restaurant while searching in Zomato and after seeing favorable reviews, decided to try it out. Placed an home delivery order for Sunday lunch at 11-10am, originally scheduled at 12-30pm. The guy at phone was pretty helpful and suggestive. Food was delivered at around 1-10pm, around 40 min late. Considering the place is not so far from my house, I could say there's a scope for improvement.   For the lunch, we decided not to go for pizza and instead had ordered other dishes. The fish...

worst Pizaa of my life!!    tyhey are very hard working people with no idea how to make a pizza, i ordered kolkata special pizza cosr 190 rs , chose "pizza Brust"  ( its not a typo , Brust they wrote) , for additional 80, so it costed 280   , they do not use mozarella cheese , and the dough was bitter , the upper crust was like skin , could not eat whole , wasted ,    for this amount you will get much better at dominos, pizzahut ,   also earlier i chose double chicken burger, chicken pa...

Today visited this amazing rooftop restaurant with my boy friend for having a candle light dinner and the location of the place is just superb. This place is ideal for a perfect romantic date with your loved one's under the sky with cool breezes and the awesome view of kolkata from the 9th floor. The dimlight makes the ambiance more adorable with light background music. The ambiance is really eye catching as well as refreshing. Coming to the foods, our order includes SOUP: Sweet corn soup STARTE...

Located next to new market in hotel Lindsay,this place has one of the best rooftops in the city and that is majorly responsible for the awesome ambience...the food and drinks are pretty good, and service decent..definitely recommended,mainly for the ambience and the rooftop view..
Good ambience.. but food is the worst.. The chowmwin and chicken is worst than a local shop.. its highly overspriced. Worst chinese in kolkata
Awesome place. So romantic environment. Food was awesome. Service are also too good. Want to  visit again and again. It was our valentine's special dinner with my dear hubby. We enjoyed a lot.

This roof top restaurant in the esplanade area has a great ambience. Ordered sula savignon blance (a white wine) and rum mojito (it was wow) as the drinks. Teriyaki chicken and chicken Hawaiian salad as the starter (both were unique). Veg Hakka noodles and hot garlic lamb in the main course. All the food were very tasty. Pocket pinch was slightly high but its okay considering the location of the restaurant..

If you are a meatlover, love various flavours of herbs, sauces and have a big hunger; look nowhere else. BFB serves awesome cooked dishes. Must try Beacon Bomb, non-veg platter. Got a heavenly complimentary mousse cake! Definitely deserves more visits.Tuhina Dutta Antik Majumdar

A nice tiny cozy place by the main road just around the corner. Great Ambience, the walls carry lovely frames with food-sarcasm. The washrooms are so well kept-I’d give you guys a 5/5 for hygiene.  Our order began with a BFB special chicken in ghost chili sauce (for real chilli lovers this may be a disappointment) the skin of the chicken was not removed- I sort of felt uncomfortable with this fact- it better be mentioned in the menu.  Next we went for the Russian Mafia-a coleslaw- a perfect bl...

1 of the better pizza joints of kolkata. Although my expectations are too high I am still looking for a joint to match the Pollo Forza of pizza express. They could add a little more flavors. Had the al pachino pizza it was good but lacked the wow factor.

The initial plan was to go for the BFB Wings challenge, but then we decided to test the waters first. The Phaadu sauce isn't named so for nothing. It is quite hot. We also tried Annie Aunty's Alfredo, Chicken Skewers with San Marzano Makhni sauce and Brownie with Ice cream and chocolate sauce. The service is quite great and so are the dishes. A place that you should definitely try out.

My Big Fat Belly is one of the finest new addition to the food scene in Kolkata with superb food at very pocket friendly prices.  Located on Sarat Bose road opposite Dugout, BFB is a small joint with a big heart. The restaurant is casual and is quite comfortable. The staff is warm, polite and the owners personally overview the place so it leaves little room for error. Menu is elaborate with some exceptional fusion dishes that come at reasonable pricing considering the ingredients, preparation an...

Visited Hatibagan outlet on a weekday. Moderately crowded. Nice environment. Tried Arsalan famous mutton biryani and some other starters. Food quality was pleasing. But The 'wow factor' was missing, I would say. Overall, I recommend this place to my friends. Worth your money, I believe.

Food was excellent .. quality of food was up to grade .. Today , I ordered chicken biriyani nd chicken reshmi kabab .. I have mouth-watering experience with all item .. reshmi kababs was excellent .. nd chicken biriyani was too good ..

Somehow we all know biriyani of arsalan is too die for,so no complain about foods..but the behaviour of the staffs are disgusting....i mean they couldnot even have the decency to serve...on top of that they are so irritating that they couldnot even let us eat properly....we were not even finish,one of the staff came and like 'should i bring the bill? R u done??' who does that...which restaurant does that....??? I have eaten in so many branches of arsalan,in most of crowds... But in this place,th...

Arsalan is indeed one of the most famous restaurant in Kolkata.  The Biriyani they are serving is undoubtedly better than all most all other restaurant in this city...but as they came to realize that they are the pioneer in this field they have started increasing their price drastically... 1 plate of mutton biryani costs ₹210.. Isn't too much? But ok.. We can afford that if only they can maintain their food hygiene.. Yesterday we had a lunch there and found hair in the biriyani twice.. Yes the...

Today's review is on  "Biryani" expert ARSALAN. Being a foody(bong) I just love Biryani.I ordered "CHICKEN ACHARI KEBAB", "CHICKEN BIRYANI" &"FIRNI".      FOODS:      Chicken achari kebab is a mouth watering starter,makes you smile. Taste of chicken biryani is brilliant.They know actually how to make biryani so tasty using less oil and this is the best part of them. Firni is also yummy. RATING: 4/5  ATMOSPHERE:   Nice.They can use light  music to make the environment better. RATING: 3/...

whatever may be the controversy but mocambo is mocambo.. try the rum collins cocktail and also the chicken supreme. the tutty fruity ice cream is also great. only went twice.. but it feels really good just to be there..

Visited Mocambo after quite a long time around 3 years. Must say this restaurant has changed a lot when it comes to their food quality, hospitality and service. Nothing to say about the interiors and ambience - as usual nothing much has changed. It has a soothing ambience of a 1970s diner. We were 10 - had to wait for 20 mins to get in. Ordered veg florentine and spinach and cheese pillows for starters. Even though served In 30-40 mins Both were delicious and worth the wait. Then we ordered stan...

I was going to this place since a kid but last time I visited them was not that pleasant..Their food quality have been deteriorated, the customer service is not that great. I believe it is only going on for the brand name

Mocambo, One of the quintessential continental restaurants of Kolkata. Before going there I had made up my mind to taste all their recommended dishes. The ambience is pleasant and the restaurant is quite spacious. Here's a list of things we had ordered- Chicken Paprika, Angels On Horseback, Fish A La Diane, Chicken Ala Keiv, Risotto with Chicken Liver, Devilled Crab, Fish Florentine, Chicken Cordon Bleu, Chicken Steak with mushroom sauce, Grilled Chicken, Pork Sirloin Steak. Each and every dish ...

I dont know about others, but it is one of my favorites. I dont know the driver who is actually famous on social media for past few months. but there ambiance, food quality, stuff behavior is truly amazing. some continental dishes are also very nice. I would recommend this place to everyone, this is one of the oldest and finest restaurant in Park Street.
It wa my daughter's birthday. We Had a lovely time with great food and xcellent service. The pleasent surprise was the entire team celebrated her birthday too. Felt great

This is a perfect place for hanging out with your friends or family or your partner. It has the Casual American dining/bar vibes. I always feel very comfortable in every Chili's outlet that I have been. There food is kinda spicy, as you know *MEXICAN*! You've to choose carefully cause they provide quite a heavy quantity. I like their drinks, as in mocktails! One must try those. I probably had something called Watermelon Mojito, which has very refreshing! And for dessert, definitely try their Rum...

Visited this place for dinners, It is very friendly welcoming place.  All personnel were very well trained, accommodating and helpful (all done with a smile). Food and drink was delicious and the view was wonderful while dining. Thanks for doing such an outstanding job to make the stay so pleasurable. and we enjoyed perfect wait service from Sushmita.

Chilli's is just amazing. I always always prefer the acropolis one because of its ambience.I tried their one dish which is grilled basa and its yummy. All staffs are very friendly and not to mention Radhe he is very courteous and knows what we prefer.Other folks also are too friendly. the best part is that all of them have this smiling faces which is really nice. When it comes to drinks i love their signature margarita.  You get value for your money you spend here.Good job guys..
Me and two of my friends recently visited the outlet today. The food and the service was amazing. It is a total yummilicious experience everytime we come here ♡♡
We had picked up chicken biriyani from this place on a really hungry afternoon. I must say that the biriyani was really nice with a handsome quantity. Thumbs up. 👍

Spicy Kolkata is located infront of Lake Mall. I took their Chicken Biryani as parcel today after a movie at Cinepolis. The Chicken Biryani was definitely worthy of Rs.140. The quantity was huge, I had to struggle to complete it. The chicken piece was good in size.
We picked up Mutton Biryani and Chicken Chap during the Pujas , both were sumptuous and reasonably priced. The owner and the staff were very welcoming. High recommendation from my side.

Ok so i m the 1st one to review.  One fine afternoon i took a parcel from this place. Mutton biriyani. Which was yum. They do provide a lot of quantity in the box. Two people can easily eat it.  Though definately not like shiraz or arsalan or aminiya, but this place is a must recommended place.

Excellent food but service was disappointing... We ordered rice, shukto, kakrar jhaal, daab chingri, jhoor jhoori alu bhaja, and finally d gondhoraj ghol...  D place serves quality food...  Do try their kakrar jhaal and daab chingri it was simply out of d world... Authentic flavours of dished vl make u crave for more😉 Happy dinning

Excellent food. Excellent staff. Well mannered,friendly. taking care for customer requirements. We were there for buffet lunch twice. Menu was very good.Many times we also ordered from  ala carte . Every single preparation is excellent. we will go there again with our guests and family members due to food quality, variety and nice staff.

Beautiful food and even better people.  We had a family get together to celebrate my son's first birthday. The food was great both in terms of variety and taste but what stood out is the exceptional service. We were made to feel right at home. From the assistance in cake cutting and serving to attending to our little needs they came through on all grounds. Can't thank them enough for making the day memorable.

If you are in kolkata.and thought for a real bagali food.i think this place absolutely  perfect by their original nostalgic cultural bagali flavour of food.test & smells of food present the authentic bagaliana..good ambiance .  must try gondhoraj chiken, bhuna mangsho.backed mihidana with rabri.
Today went for lunch at this place,interior decoration is good, service is good ,food is okay not bad not great.I will recommend this place to those people who have never eaten Bengali food ever.

Located just opposite to the park hotel. Ambiance, decoration and the food was top-notch, one should visit if you have vegetarian friends. We ordered Chickpea falafel pita, pesto season veggie and cheese cake.   Personally I liked the pesto season veggie which basically looks like a patties stuffed with zucchini, yellow squash and lots of oregano.
Beautiful place, you cab click lots of pictures. They serve drinks in beautiful way, you ll just love them, but only few are good in taste, as well as prices are also high.

A great vegetarian restaurant that offers drinks on the pub street of Kolkata - Park Street. They have some great food, many of them are fusion food and are quite unique. We ordered for baby corn and masala fries, both were tasty and the dips were perfect with the food. I loved the cheese dip that came with the masala fries.  Great service - I requested for some new cocktail which is not on the menu. The bartender was quick to offer a tweaked version of Cosmopolitan to suit the valentine day mo...

Hakuna Matata is a vegetarian restaurant located on park street. The menu offers a wide range of different dishes from around the world. The restaurant is colourfully decorated and very clean. When first i saw the interior from outside i was very tempted to try food here. One of the newest All veggie joint on Park Street. Interesting cuisine, unique menu and variety, amazing food presentation, moderately priced. This place is a must try if you are on Park street and have already tried the legacy...

This place is cozy and nice with modern outlook,the food is amazing,even though I die for non-vegetarian food, will recommend this vegetarian place, all the food items we ordered were really tasty, beautifully garnished and plated. It's comparetively new in Park Street but definitely doing a good job.

Awesome place to hangout with your special one and friends. Located just opposite nazrul manch at southern avenue. UBER cabs from any where in Kolkata/Howrah/Sealdah will carry you there. E1, AC 1 bus also comes directly as it takes southern avenue route before reaching golpark. Alternatively if you come from dumdum/sealdah...take a metro and get down at kalighat/rash behari and than take a auto to reach.. I loved the ambience the most. As it was Sumday evening so everyone tables were engaged an...

Awesome cafe with a spectacular view..u can sit inside or out on the roof...great if u want to hang out with your friends while drinking some quality liquor and eating some delicious food..alas they dont serve hookah any more...but they do have a table built inside a small pool where u can sit with your feet in the water...this place is a bit on the expensive side...but u will get worth of every penny that u spend here..i will be sure to give this place another visit  in the near future...

As i read so many good reviews about this place we went to celebrate Christmas here. The place is quite good. The view from the rooftop is beautiful. Food tastes good. We ordered 4 chicken sandwich and 1 Turkey sandwich. Unfortunately they did not serve those 4 chicken sandwich. We waited for like almost 2 hours. Then a waiter said we have to change our order cause chicken sandwich was not not available. It took them 2 hours to inform us. So we had very bad experience here. Our Christmas was alm...

Place is nice, but the hospitality from the staff disheartened me. I had changed my seat from indoor to outdoor, that time, one of them told, " tule de". And many other things they were doing which was intolerable.

Visited with friends. Avoid pick times on holidays coz its very buzzy. Music was too loud inside the room. Food menu- good not outstanding! Taste- Good. View- Awesome Skyline. Pool table was an added interest. Good hangout stuff!

My 2nd encounter at spicekraft started with what they called painkiller.wish such painkillers exists everywhere but it is in this awesome place you get such unmatched pleasures. Other dishes were great but it is painkiller which was the killer. The prawn Thermidor was melt in the mouth tooo.... Many times more...

This has been a long pending one.. I have been here for a few times and I would love to go there again and again for: Beer Can Tempura Fish, Dajaj Charmoula, 100% Jack Daniels Mousse. They may serve a lot more but yeah, these items standout from the rest. Probably one the best batter fish preparations and UNDOUBTEDLY one of the best desserts in the city.  Besides food, the ambience alongwith the interactive and hospitable staff (especially the F&B Manager) can make your evenings an enjoyable one...

This is a nice place 2 hangout and have some delicious foods. Asian and North Indian is its mainstream. Nicely decorated place but, place is short. Price is pocket friendly compare to dazzling food it offers. Food is served beautifully. Captains r nice.

Oh my God!!   That was the first thing that I said after I got up to go from this place, fully satisfied with the experience and making a mental note to come here again and again to try every possible VEGETARIAN dish available here.  The ambience here is quite likeable with soft music playing in the backyard. Perfect for a conversation with family or friends without getting disturbed by the music. Accompanying the music is the wide array of cocktails, wine and other drinks which compliment the o...
This place is really great for anybody who is bored with same old mainstream food. Interesting menu filled with tasty food and has variety to it. One of the best dine out place in town.😊

I will always remember this place as my first venture to Park St. Almost four years ago, and I still get the same flavour, same feeling and same ambience when I go there today. The people who visit, the waiters who serve and the food which fills-everything is perfect. Places like this are for life. And life is for places like Olypub.

This is the oldest pub of kolkata. A must try as they have renovated and made it a good one. Must try is beef steak and beer. Enjoying the great conversation with food and drinks. It also has a very lively environment, if you go alone you won't be left alone.

Nice place to chill out with friends as it serve alcohol on a low budget. Always crowded and is one of the legendary places to booze in Kolkata. Have been there many times. Tried their beef steak and fish reshmi kebab. Kebab was nice but less in quantity, the steak was a little hard and nothing extraordinary I felt, too much hype about it though. Pocket friendly place to grab a drink i feel.

Very bad service. Have been sitting here and ordered chicken a la kiev an hour ago, still no sign of it. Have been here before but never the service has been so bad. Will think twice next time before coming here.
Horrible staffs and food. No cocktails, takes too much time to serve, keeps asking for a tip, and are always hurrying to vacate. Will never visit again.

Lovely Place to begin with....Best Place to chill out with friends with fast food from around the world and unlimited tea at Rs.50.  The place has a very interesting concept. After you grab a table, you grab a tray and start roaming around the large, well decorated restaurant and grab the food from the display racks, you pay the bill, take it to the kitchen, they modify your food, like warm it, add condiments to it etc.   After sending some fantastic time with my friend, we went ahead for the so...
best place to hangout with friends and family.. spend quality time over world class coffee or tea.. and off course world class food.. specially salmon that i ate for the first time here.

Actually, I would have given them a 1.0 for their food now. If they have earned their extra 1.5 points, it's divided for their unlimited tea along with the great ambience. Their unlimited soda is good too, but can you really give them credit for good soda? Their tea alone has fetched them 1.0 point. They have a great collection of flavoured teas and it's one of the best places to go to if you're a tea fanatic or just want to catch up with your friends over tea/coffee. But for foodies? Nope. Quan...
Coconut cookies and cinnamon rolls are my favourite  the tiramisu is quiet costly according to the quantitybut they taste great. I recommend to give it a try and i am sure people will like it.
Good collection of cold n hot sandwiches, Classic mac n cheese with chicken tastes delicious. Cinnamon roll is a must try. Just happened not to like the iced mint tea. Good enough for a quick bite.

Finally royal hotel is in South Calcutta.  Many may have an issue with the biriyani not having potatoes but I love it.  The mutton pasinda,  mutton chnaap and tikia are worth salivating all day.  The best is that they deliver home....  What paradise...

A legacy in the field of biriyani....went there during the puja with my maternal uncle.....biriyani seemed light though it was pretty oily.kebabs were out of the world though......ambience was sophiscated and the staff had a professional behaviour...quite and efficient...overall a prized resturant

Hearing so much about this place,I expected a lot from here. I went there on december..we ordered mutton biriyani and rumali roti and chicken chap. Though we loved the biriyani,but chicken chap was very greasy. I am not disappointed but there was nothing too special about it.
I had ordered for chicken biryani over here and what i got was the worst biryani i could have possibly tasted in my whole life. Definitely wouldn't recommend this dish to anyone.

I went today to this restaurant since my Mughlai craving needed to be satisfied. And satisfied it was!  I went with my parents to this restaurant. Firstly, its a very well lit and clean restaurant. Coming to the food, we had the Chicken Malai Kebab, Mutton Boti Gosht, Chicken Butter Masala and the Mutton Roghan Gosht. The chicken items were pure heaven: hot and delicious! Mutton dishes on the other hand can use some improvement. The spices were good but it needed to be cooked just a little bit m...
Good food. Good service. Good Ambiance. Quantity as per the price could have been a bit more but beyond that there not a single thing to complain about. Will visit again for sure.

Last Saturday I went there for lunch with Pratik Basak ..we wait near about 30mins at ground floor to get the table..wall decor and ambiance was truly attractive..and when we went at 1st floor to our table..we were really over whelmed by the decorations..its awesome..we got a window side table..and the nice part about the table was that it was a hanging table..all the staffs were really ...

This is one of the best outlets in Park Street that I have ever been to. I wish I could rate 4.7. 😍  Ambience - With some quirky decor, this place has set a perfect ambiance that one would love to visit. It has seating arrangements done properly. You can avail the seats for roadside view. 😊  Food - Had Honey Chicken, Bali Bami Noodles, Chicken Three Pepper Bomb and Cranberry Mocktail. *Honey Chicken was perfect. Would love to visit for this again and again.  *Bali Bami Noodles was great. I...

It's been sometime that I'm hearing the buzz about this restaurant and yesterday when I visited the place I realised why. The place with its quirky decor, the warm greetings & food which is totally worth the hole it left in my pocket. I have nothing to say about the food except the word awesome! The Chunky Caramel Sponge Cake with Toffee Sauce left me ecstatic. Except for the ambience & the wobbly table I have no complaints whatsoever. They need to work on their music. The comments on the Ts wor...

We went for lunch. The first thing we noticed entering was thier warm welcome.They even managed to give us place while it was packed.Thank you for the service.We ordered chicken fried rice, Cantonese pan fried noodles, chicken three pepper bomb. Food was awesome. The service was quick and good. Staffs were cordial and helpful. We didn't like the music though. Being a Park St restaurant it definitely burns your pocket. But it's worth a visit.

Lovely decor. Lovely place. Great menu. Good staff. Super music. Nice mocktails. Food presentation is very good. Food taste can be impeoved. Ordered for a spanish platter. Look was good but taste could be better.

I'll not deny that bikers cafe does provide some lip smacking food, but a few dishes here I didn't find that tasty. Coming to the arabiata sauce pasta, I didn't find it quite nice. But the alfredo sauce one was very yummy. The chicken wings was too sour. And I didn't like the taste of it at all. The drinks and shakes are quite nice, though extremely sweet. And among desserts, I simply adored the strawberry pancake. The aloo parathas were fine. Do visit cause the ambience willl blow your mind!

Getting excited after reading the reviews I hopped into this place but to speak the truth the cafe didn't meet my expectations. Though the ambiance of the place is above average but the food quantity provided as per the price is way less. There was nothing special on the Valentine Day's menu either except  the Dark Lord and the House Cold Coffee which managed to earn the aforementioned rating.

One of the classics in the city for breakfast Aloo paratha is crazy 😍 loved it The interiors, the quick & prompt service & the delicious food makes customers happy and they are specialised in the above.

The name perfectly matched with the feel of this cafe. The decor is very nice.  The rustic look and the dress of the staffs will give you the biker feel. They've made a separate section for sheesha smokers. Presentation of the food is beautiful . The place is spacious and the staffs are well behaved.  Collection of music isn't good and somehow I feel it's overpriced! Have to pay around 30% tax.  It's dissapointing.

Wow and just wow. A must visit for every food lover.  Wanted to visit this place for so long, finally managed to visit this on saptami. Went there with a couple of my friends and they too loved this one. Decoration of this place is what attracted me the most, it was simply lavish. One look at this place and you would certainly think that this is the place to eat & when you taste the food u would feel , yes I made the right choice.  Food was really good, tried a dish that I have tried in some o...

Great place,  great ambience, great food ! A must try place. Staff was friendly and courteous.  I had a great evening here. We tried peri peri fries , pizza , cosmotini,  sangria, and glenlivet 12yrs scotch. I hope to visit this place again very soon. Do pay a visit.

This place was on List from quite some time..!! and finally.. definitely NOT DISAPPOINTING :D the ambience is totally beautiful with purple color and the beautiful chandeliers. It gives you a feeling of an AMerican style pub. there are different seating styles. you can get your privacy if you sit in the cage style tables. the call bells are also placed so your orders can be taken.   coming to food and drinks, the smoking puchka is MUST try!!! LIITs are also good. Definitely go for cocktails. Th...

BROKEN GLASS PIECE IN THE FOOD. HORRIBLE, SHITTY, WORST EXPERIENCE EVER.  I don't know what the hell has happened to this place.  1. I was served lasagna in a chipped bowl. The small piece went in my mouth and the chef accepted the fact that it must have slipped and then also they served it. The manager just was totally unapologetic and he just had one thing to say in his defence 'This hasn't happened before'. Totally ignorant and negligent staff.  2. The food was pathetic to say the least. Had ...

Ordered Nachos n bruschetta for starters...nachos were stale n smelly....bruschetta was not at all upto the standards n cold...ordered pizza n lasagne for main course, restaurant was empty in the afternoon n yet it took some 30 minutes to get it...horrible service n sub standard food...my experience got bad to worst; my brother found a piece of glass in the lasagne..the chef accepted the dish had probably slipped as the glass bowl carried an evident chip....i am amused at the kind of safety n se...
One of the best place to hang around in the vicinity. A bit costly but worth it. Ambiance is supercool. Peeps who like to party it's a must visit for them.

The ambience is undoubtedly the best in the city. Right from the music to the lights, everything was perfect. Same with food- the Mezze platter was exactly how it should be, not the indianised version of it. The snacks complimentary with the drink too was very different from the other places.  The only thing pulling me back from giving it a 5 star is the person who was taking our order. He didn't seem to have any knowledge about the dishes, and also appeared to be a little out of place.

Being a lounge in such a dignified hotel, the price are expected to be a pinch somehow, but the place was ok to me. Ironically i liked the sitting area better than the open area. Interiors of the closed lounge was way better and appealing. The service can be improved to maintain the standards of the hotel rest no complaints.

You expect the pocket punch to be on the higher side given that this is a star hotel. However, for exactly the same reason, you also expect a lot when it comes to experience. Unfortunately that was missing. Overall experience is not disappointing but the value for money factor is not quite there. Food quality is average and the service is good. Open air seating has open about 3 tables and hence you have to be lucky to find a place there. The open air seating is perfect if you just want to chat a...

Just a bad experiance went to attend a party today and oder hookah firstly they told hookah will be served down but after a hour of follow up they told hookah will be served upstair then we went upstair then they told hookah is finished and when we ask for refund they told bill once punched we cant refund...so our money got in drain...and they are blaming us only...will never suggest for this place...the hospitiality is very poor manager are rude...please dont ever visit...

This place is a blast of Mexico, creatively presented in a few plates. I loved the platters, nachos and the deals on drinks. I do think that the drinks can get better. The ambience makes up for the flaws.

OVER PRICED, OVER HYPED and OVER RATED.After watching a movie in Quest mall, we decided to pay a visit at the famous 'Chili's'.The ambience was good, but not out of the world. Anyways, we grabbed a window seat for a better view.We ordered Chicken and Shrimp Fajita which was served gorgeously on a sizzler plate along with a variety of condiments and warm tortillas. Making fajita is huge fun..but taste wise it was not as great as we expected. Next we ordered Orleans Jambalaya which was rice...

I'll straightaway start with the food of Chili's. In one word: paisa vasool! We ordered the classic nachos with fajita chicken, the fish and fries and the Southeast Caesar salad. The taste was good and something even better was the serving size. We ordered two mocktails, Evolution and Fusion, both fruit-based and citrusy. And lastly, we had the famous molten chocolate lava cake which was extremely chocolaty and delicious.  Also, on a different note, the lighting is amazing for selfies! Very good...
Very prompt in service, great ambience and good fresh food. Can't ask of anything more. Am very impressed with this outlet. Was pending for long and had a great time. Thank you. Will visit again

I came here yesterday and ordered a Non veg 3 dipper appetizer which was good.The chicken were soft and juicy.I also ordered an Ancho chili Salmon with chipotle rice which i recommended my friends to try it out too as the salmon was perfectly cooked and was quite delicious too.Service was fast and good too.Will surely come back again and try out different dishes as there's a lot in the Menu to choose from.

Well...after a long time ...😊..so,Coffee House..n  the name is enough for the people of kolkata. Tried Chicken Afgani, Cold Coffee with Cream and Egg Sandwich... The food was good but not as expected😔..

This legendary and renowned place is famous for বাঙালির nostalgia with a cup of গরম কফি,পাকোড়া আর cigarette and টেবিল চাপড়ানো আড্ডা,গান,প্রেম,পলিটিক্স।। along with a emotion for MANNA DEY'S famous song "কফি হাউসের সেই আড্ডাটা" ।।।। If i hv to rate its food quality dn i wont gv it good rates..but according to nostalgic atmosphere,emotion,as ...

Indian Coffee House is located near to college street. This place is legendary and adda for many college students.We ordered coffee but it was not at all good, may be it's degraded over the years.But you can visit this place for its atmosphere which was amazing.

More than anything Coffee House in an emotion. If you are a true Calcuttan chances are you have been here at least once in your lifetime. Though with time the coffee has degraded but the place is still the same. So is the feel. Do grab the egg sandwich and chicken cutlet while experiencing coffee houser sei adda.
Leagendery place of kolkata, needs no introduction.....ordered chicken cutlet ,fish kabiraji ,mutyon cutlet and coffee... great place for adda

Nizam's is located near Kolkata Municipal Corporation building,New Market area.I went to this place yesterday and ordered Mutton Kathi kebab, Double egg chicken roll.Both the items were good for me nothing great about to talk.Ambience and service was okay.

Sudden visit to this place and was quite impress with the food. Location is new market near hogg market. Ambiance is below average. Staff were very nice and helped us in placing order. We ordered nizams paratha, mutton kassa, mutton sikh kabab and salad. Mutton kassa was tasted heavenly , sikh kabab was okayies and nizams paratha was very oily and not upto the mark. Overall good experience, very pocket friendly. Looking forward to visit again and try their kathi kabab.

A shopping spree at new Market that too without food?? That's so not me. Nizam's being one of the legendary ones needs no introduction. We had lunch there today. Although the rolls seemed to top the charts I wanted to have biriyani. The Kathi kebab looked appealing and hence I tried that too. Quantity wise the chicken biriyani was okayish but the sad part is it contained small a piece of chicken which lacked marination. The rice was too salty for my taste .The kebab pieces were minute and presen...

Anything i say about this place will be less..just loveeeee their rolls so much and the kababs..oh my god!they are just lip smacking...😋😋😋the biriyani is although not that much tasty for me..but the kathi rolls and other chicken and mutton dishes are just awesomer.must try their kathi rolls.

Ahoy old friend.... When i was in college... Me n my friends used to come here frequently. Though the visits lessened over the time, but old time came back when me n my bestie met and chat over biriyani and yummy tangri kebab. Taste was good as usual... Tangri kebabs were lip-smacking tasty. Person attending us was soo helpful and patient with our demands and food deciding times. Thumbs up.
One of the best buffet in kolkata... Value for money and mouth watering food. Super duper liked. Kebabs are jus awesome .. Loads of varities in food. Hence , known as World of kebabs.
It is the best buffet in kolkata.  Starter,  main course and desert all are very much tasty. I highly recommend this place to all. Money well spent.

Wonderful! I never had any complaints about the hospitality of the staff across speciality restaurants and Sigree wasn't an exception either. If I had to compare the kebabs between Flame and Grill and Sigree I would rate the former a 3/5 and the latter 4/5. Overall a great experience with a lot of variety on offer in...

Wow.....wow...wow...what a lovely resturant . Never got a chance to review this place..Wonderful food with great careings . Its the best buffet in town from chicken to prawn extremly delicious starters and main course . All the staffs are very goodThe chef Mr.Rohit is very efficient but this review doesnot stop before praising two people  MR. SUROJIT SINHA  & MR.RANA PALIT (Resturant Manager both) extremly careling with each and every guests . Please reach out to him at any problem you face . Ne...

One of the best buffets in town. Both veg and non veg starters are treat to your tongue and mind. Coming to main dishes, veg biriyani is quite better than the non veg one. In desert section choco brownie is a killer.

The tenderness the softness the drool!! They have got it all! Yhe umpteen search for a true kebab joint and a by heart by soul kabuli cuisine comes to an end. Priced very practically and the not to be missed out green tea.

Amazing food. The gigantic naan is a real center piece to the table of yummy mouth watering dishes.. A small place at the park circus crossing which I had passed umpteen number of times, but never thought of visiting until a friend introduced us to it. It's definitely a hidden gem in the heart of the city..

Mughlai food never been better! True Afghan@ Restaurant, True Afghan Owner, True Afghan Cook!!! Couldn't ask for more! The food is not flooded with oil, the food is riched with the right ingredients... The biggest and softest ROTI in town... People who have not had the experience of MUTTON NAHARI just jump in!!! My Favourite, Soon It Will Be Yours Too😊 Tapas Sen
It has been wonderful experience as far as food is concerned.. Ambience wasn't that good... Ppl r very humble n hospitable...  Price was also reasonable..  Overall a nive experience
My first visit to this place. Authentic Afghani food. Very good people and good service. I had mutton kadhai and mutton keema, it was awesome. I'm ought to try everything in the menu in coming days.

Durbari is the fine dining restaurant in the plush Swissotel Kolkata. Its accessible from the main hotel lobby, as well as a separate entrance from the 2nd floor, adjacent CC2. The decor is top notch. As we entered, the first thing we saw is one long drinks counter having an assortment of IMFL and foreign brands and on entering the dine-out area, it was a soothing decor  Upon sitting, the condiments arrived. It was an assortment of 5 types of chutney, standard pickle/ onion and papad basket. Out...

Good food along with good ambience. Service deserves a special mention. Their veg platter was pretty good. Loved the luchi aloodum but their dal makhani n paneer was pretty average which was a bit of letdown for us. Their veg pulao was very delicious as well.

We had Murg makhni andaaz and Paneer durbari with butter naan. Beforehand we asked about the quantity and we were told that it would be insufficient for three of us, thus we ordered two dishes. walked in for dinner....extremely overpriced for the quality of services and food served . I see some similar reviews but it is charging more than a 5star for a 2 star food. Ambience ok. Ashutosh Prasad
Day well spent with my lovely wife on our anniversary day. Good foods good ambience. Perfect luxurious dinner. Like to visit again...........

The food's awesome as was expected. Tenderloin steak is a must as is any item from the grill. The staff are well informed of the food that you order and what goes into it.  The menu on Zomato though is not updated. There are a few new items and I found that the pork fillet was missing from the menu itself there. The prices indicated on Zomato are old and the average cost for 2 would run you up around 3k with taxes.   The ambience is what sets it apart. Cabanas are to be preferred any day especia...
Great Place & Great Ambiance. A bit isolated from city but worth visiting. Visited with a friend of mine. Food was good. Loved it. Will visit again no doubt!
Very impressive rooftop settings - the cabanas were a delight. Drinks were decent; service average. Might not be the best atmosphere on a sticky, summer evening.
Great ambience  great place to be .... But some menu items are not being served ... So that's a drawback... But ALL in all a great place to bring a date .....

Perfct place! Good Food, Good place, Good Service. Just a lil expensive but this is place is just Wow and deserves the price, not only because of the food but because the kind of atmosphere it creates.😍 Best place if you would want to go on a date :p This place offers peace. It's best to go in winters.
Though a new place in town but the ambience and the food is really good, they serve in the shortest time and the cutlery is quite different....Do try cheese aloo kabab and four cheese pizza...

This new place bang across Quest mall is a must visit in the city. The food, hospitality, ambiance everything has been taken care of from the minute of details. I have visited this place twice, once the lounge and the second time the restaurant and I personally loved the NAWWARAH platter, khowsuey, amritsari chole kulche to name a few dishes from the lounge menu. Also, at the restaurant corn tulips, kofta Shyam savera, vegetable casserole ...

Please avoid this place..

had a seat in the g floor , beautiful starter stuffed mushroom , very tasty ,  main course was amazing , well bhved staff ,  soothing interiors & instrumental music,  after dinner also went to check upstairs ,  how beautifully done  & a happy place :))))))))))

0.5 points deduction only bcoz of the interiors.. Food though was lip smacking and extremely extremely delicious.. Despite being full, couldn't resist loading myself with the mutton biriyani, mutton chaap, and nargisi kofta.. Oh I wish I could ear everyday..

This place certainly needs no introduction. Royal is one of the oldest restaurants in Kolkata and started serving biriyani much before the existence of Shiraz, Arsalan, Aminia.....had bookmarked this place few months back and siezed the opportunity to drop by while visiting the Bara Bazaar area for some work.  Order :  # Rumali Roti  # Mutton chap - Royal being known for its chap, decided to go for it. The mutton pieces were soft and boneless, moderately spiced and not too greasy. I didn't reali...

Royal Indian Hotel in Bura Bazar is one of the finest place in this area. Very popular for their Biryani. I went here recently and tried their Mutton Biryani which is much talked about. The Biryani was damn good. Price seemed bit high Rs.180 but quality was fine. We also had Mutton keema and Roti both were really goo
ahha..what a biriyanj man..just awesome...and the mutton...if u r in kolkata and u don't know the royal biriyani...then feel sorry for the biriyani lovers.. Rupam Sen

Royal Indian Hotel is one of the place to dine in at Bara Bazar area. The restaurant is close to the crossing of Zakaria Street and Rabindra Sarani. My All Time Favourite! This place kinda tops at creative! They really did a lot for the cute and UNIQUE Decor. Visited this during the puja along with some friends. This is really a place to visit for food lovers. Staffs are polite and helpful. Ambience is the best thing about this place, its purely soothing. Decor is absolutely awesome and something to look out for. Seats are good and gives you the right comfort to enjoy the food.  We ordered a couple of different dishes as each one ordered something different. Very happy to say that all of them tasted so good. Have you ever had a meal in an old abandoned bungalow? This place gives you the exact feels! The guys here have done their best to renovate this old house into a beautiful restaurant-cafe-bar and everything in this place just looks like a dream!  We ordered salad and a chicken dish!  Ambience of the place is spacious and it feels like home. The intricate detailing to the decoration adds glamour and ethnicity of the place.  Quality of thr food is amazing but i felt the quantity to be less and tha...

Rooftop seating with lip smacking tummy filling delicacies ❤ Went there a few days back for the first time. A well decorated cafe and bar at the same time. Excellent food quality and a beautiful ambience 😊 One must visit this beautiful place 😄

It was weekend and we were desperately in search of some proper place to hang out. After going through the reviews we finally decided to land here. As we entered it gives you the feeling of the old Kolkata. Lovely ambiance, perfectly set music.. The mirrors setup n the wall was something very amazing and ofcourse very innovative. Coming to the food. We ordered peruvian bhetki with crab meat sauce and south african peri peri prawns. The bhetki was perfectly done. It actually had that charcoal gri...

one of the restaurant in Kolkata, been visiting since childhood days,infrastructure has changed massively. Food 🍴 quality is good. A must try Kacchi Biryani, Shahi Tukra,Firni, the kebabs cannot be missed... Hoping to visit again soon.

Had biryani today it was soo good. I ordered mutton Kacchi biryani that is famous over there seriously the mutton piece is perfect and well cooked obviously . And the ambience is also great there is no extra taxes .

This place is just beside fancy market. It is a beautiful restaurant. The food was awesome. We had kababs, mutton biryani, firni. Everything tasted so good.😍 Quantity of the food was good too. Prices are pocket friendly. The service was very good. You must visit here sometimes.
The service was really very fast but the food was not up to the mark...chicken tandoori was nice ,rezala and chicken barta was not good as earlier ,nice place to go ...

To visit this place has always been in my to do list!!  And the dream did come true located on the heart of Park Street this place is legendary category famous! Absolutely mouth smacking Chinese, superb ambience!  Has different restaurants. We tried the Chinese. And absolutely amazing!  :) Don't miss it his of you visit Calcutta guys! :)
Nice location. Good Ambience. Comfortable hospitality. Quick service. Nice food and apt seating arrangements. Family can visit. Moreover bar and separate party place for 15-16 ppl.

The tried and tested stuff. One of the places you don't miss if visiting the city. Did not have much time as got just 20 mins. Ordered chilli chicken and boy was it great!! Ordered pan fired noodles, could be better. But can complain. Will come back again.

Barbeque is one of the most famous restaurants of Kolkata. It is the one restaurant you find yourself going again and again to because it's fool proof. You are guaranteed good food no matter when you and no matter what you order. Awesome Chinese and Indian cuisine alike. Must recommend the soups here. They are especially sensational.
Superb. BarBQ is a all time favorite. Try the Galauti kebabs there. Just awesome. One of the very few resturants in ParkStreet which is not exorbitantly priced. Overall nice. :)

A very beautiful ambience with awesome food. I went there with my friends n had the grilled chicken burger followed by an oreo brownie.. it was awesome and just the right amout to fill you up. A very nice n student friendly place. The customer service was also very nice with all friendly smiles. 😊

This place has literally blown my mind with its food...its best for breakfast or evening adda with friends..seating arrangement is nice with outdoor seating area for smokers..the best part is the food and drinks...exceptional quality...brilliant to taste...tries the bacon tornado and fried cakes with jam and the peach ice tea...and i think i have fallen in love...i feel this is going to be my go to for snacks from now on...

Cozy and ecstatic atmosphere.Prices are a bit costly but every item tasted heavenly.If you are a foodie you should visit it atleast once with your friends.The item that i loved the most was the chicken wings(can't remember the name,regret for that)....
Simple and neat cafe in Tollygunge area.  Ordered chicken burger and chicken wings here.  Both the dishes are yummy. They also have a small gift shop.
Ambience 4/5 Service 4/5 Food  4/5 Extra 0.5 for the courteousness of the staff as well as the manager! Wish to come here more often and will recommend to all my friends :)

Had heard about this place in 2015 but for time for a visit on 2017 as we all know that the world is round. Now according to me about this outlet specification AMBIENCE - 5/5 QUALITY OF FOOD - 5/5 SERVICE- 2/5 TASTE - 4.5/5 WELCOME NOTE- 4.2/5  Everything is perfect from start till the end but due to a small mistake I have given 2 rating for service.

Rahul Dey Nothing to say much about this place, great place , great awadhi exp, awesome ambience, great decor, staff and lastly delicious food. Oudh, a den for biryani lovers. If you are a person who loves to have biryani even on a scorching sunny afternoon then you must pay your visit to this place.
