Mughal khana.. amazing place to satisfy your stomach and tastebuds.. specially zaafrani kabab.. a mouthwatering tasty dish.. the tastes are so like mughlai dishes. The decor and ambience are too good to have food solely. Hope to visit again soon.

A mind blowing themed restaurant. They have very successfully brought about the essence of Mughal era; even the AC and Speakers are customised according to the theme. 5/5 for the ambiance.   Food is delicious. You are bound to go back there once you taste their Moti Biryani. And be careful while placing the order since the quantity is pretty high, you may not be able to consume a full place of biryani on your own specially if you have starter or soft drinks beforehand; so order wisely.   Staffs ...

So I visited JW Kitchen yesterday for the dinner and opted for buffet I was not happy with the services though the fnb team were trying their best but still they couldn't made it well . I had ordered for Indian breads to have my main course but it took 1 hours to get it. The buffet was good especially the Chinese and desserts. But you should keep some refreshments welcome drinks in the buffet . I hope it will improve in future.

Words fail me as I sit down to begin this review. Such was the grandeur of this place, that it leaves no room of any second judgement. We were greeted gracefully by every staff member we encountered. The interior is absolutely marvelous with the high ceiling. The decor and all the gliteratti left us absolutely spellbound. The reception holds a comfortable oversized couch and a high-chair which is pretty impressive.  The dining area is huge and spacious. The buffet selection is very sumptous and ...
Various dishes,Excellent food.  Behaviour of the staff was very good and friendly,really appreciated it. Buffet was too good. Great ambience! :)  Loved the place.

The ambience is no doubt too good but when coming to the food quality its moderate but its healthy . A place for luxury dinning . The price of the buffet is also less which is bearable . Visited for two times and i love this place hope to see you soon again 😎

JW kitchen is located in the ground floor of the hotel on the left hand side of the entrance. The hall is big with options of two seats, four seaters and upto 10 seaters (couch). They have an outdoor seating arrangement too. To start with the starters, there are enough options to pick and choose both for veg as well as non veg. Lamb with smashed potato is the best. Live counters are there where u can order and they will  serve on the table (just inform table no). Coming to salads the options are...

the orange shades over dim lights gives this place a perfect ambiance which makes your focus limited to your table,your food and the lovely people you are there to dine with.a perfectly soothing and getaway experience.no distractions in the environment.service was swift since we ordered their fast moving classic dish- the chelo kebab.truly a classic.this was my first time there.loved it.

The place came very highly recommended - but I found it over rated. We were warned that the place would have waiting - but it only took 5 mins to get a table. The place is a little dingy, the waiters a little distracted (we ordered two fresh limes, one with water one with soda, both salted. When they came - both were sweet). The menu on the top looks adorable!  We ordered the dum ki raan to start (delicious, meat was very tender), the chicken steak sizzler (nice) and their speciality kebab serve...

My favourite place to eat in all of Kolkata! Visited this place for the first time two years back when I could hardly afford it. Saved up for a time, just because Peter Cat. Chello kebab, sizzlers... Also the chicken biryani are heavenly. I remember having peas pulao here as well, and God! did it taste good. Such a plain dish, prepared with such meticulous care. When I got my first job, I knew where to take my family for dinner. I just knew it. They profusely appreciated the Chello kebab. Peter ...

Peter Cat is located near to Park Street metro station. I went to this legendary place yesterday and as you enter you can see why this place is legendary.As usual i picked up their famous dish chelo kebab. Chelo kebab dish comes with butter rice,egg and kebab. Chelo kebab was fantastic and ambience, service was great.
Horrible experience with Peter cat 2 times. Please check the normal water before drink. I didn't like chelo kababs..  Bt good ambition... Good location.. Bt that's it..

The place to be if you are a kebab lover. The unlimited kebabs they serve to start off fills you up. I hardly had anything for lunch or desserts. Why have anything else if you can crave on so many varieties of kebabs. This is a very favorite place of mine, and luckily they have outlets in other cities as well. When you are bored of bad food, you can always rely upon barbeque nation. The interiors and staffs, needless to say, are always good.
The best buffet lunch is served here. It was my best friend's birthday. It is quite affordable and each of the food was delicious enough and lip smacking. We loved the food,specially the starters.

Nothing much to say about this wonderful place at the corner of park street. The starters are awesome expect the baked corn. Just have starters and deserts. Don't waste your real estate inside the stomach for main course which you can get the same at other places.
Best place to have buffet. Try with friends. You will enjoy every moment of it. Staffs are well behaved. Starters are mouth watering. Though live music was not there overall experience was good

In one word....just awesome...from the starters to the dessert every dish is worth tasting.....ambience,hospitality are too good....zomato pls allow me to rate 100 upon 5 to this awesome place....😘😘😘😘😘😘😁😁😁
